resources.string:
This is the select menu. 
Clicking any type of die will select it and add one of it. 
Click the Add button to add an additional die of the selected type. 
Click the Select button to reopen the menu and select another type of die. 
Click a die to replace or remove it. 
Check out the help screen for more info.

This is the select menu, it opens when 
the screen is empty or when you click 
the "SELECT" button. 
Select a type of die from the menu to add it. 
 
Click the "ADD" button to add more of your 
selected type. 
 
Click a die to replace or remove it. 
 
When you're ready - start rolling!
